channel.title: Java Commonmark on Simple Solution

item.title: Java Parse Markdown to HTML using CommonMark
item.description: In this Java tutorial we learn how to convert a markdown string into HTML string using the CommonMark Java library. How to add CommonMark library to the Java project To use the CommonMark Java library in the Gradle build project, add the following dependency into the build.gradle file. implementation 'org.imgscalr:imgscalr-lib:4.2' To use the CommonMark Java library in the Maven build project, add the following dependency into the pom.xml file.
